skills.name: Execute
skills.description:
Strikes adjacent targets, dealing 
$DMG damage. Applies a fatal condition.

ranks.description:
Strikes adjacent targets, dealing 
$DMG damage. Applies a fatal condition.

skills.name: Stomp
skills.description: Stomps at the ground, dealing $DMG damage to nearby targets. Applies a snare condition.

ranks.description: Stomps at the ground, dealing $DMG damage to nearby targets. Applies a snare condition.

skills.name: Blood_Gush
skills.description: Deals $DMG damage to nearby targets, then applies a bleed condition to them.

ranks.description: Deals $DMG damage to nearby targets, then applies a bleed condition to them.

skills.name: Shield_Bash
skills.description: Deals $DMG damage to adjacent targets, then applies a snare condition.

ranks.description: Deals $DMG damage to adjacent targets, then applies a snare condition.

skills.name: Cyclone
skills.description: The Fighter throws their weapon as a boomerang, dealing $DMG constant damage as it collides with targets.

ranks.description: The Fighter throws their weapon as a boomerang, dealing $DMG constant damage as it collides with targets.

skills.name: Shockwave
skills.description: Smashes the ground and emits a shockwave, dealing $DMG damage to targets. Additionally has a chance to apply a snare condition.

ranks.description: Smashes the ground and emits a shockwave, dealing $DMG damage to targets. Additionally has a chance to apply a snare condition.

skills.name: Lethal_Strike
skills.description: Charge and release skill. Sends the Fighter into a dash, landing a heavy force attack on hit, dealing $DMG damage.

ranks.description: Charge and release skill. Sends the Fighter into a dash, landing a heavy force attack on hit, dealing $DMG damage.

skills.name: Rage
skills.description: Drives the Fighter and their nearby allies into a fit of rage, increasing all power stats temporarily.

ranks.description: Drives the Fighter and their nearby allies into a fit of rage, increasing all power stats temporarily.

skills.name: Reflect
skills.description: Allows the Fighter to reflect 20% melee damage back to the target if successfully parried. Additionally increases parry window time and parry stagger time towards targets by 40%.

ranks.description: Allows the Fighter to reflect 20% melee damage back to the target if successfully parried. Additionally increases parry window time and parry stagger time towards targets by 40%.

skills.name: Bulwark
skills.description: Decreases stamina usage when blocking attacks by 60%. Additionally increases defense and magic defense by 10.

ranks.description: Decreases stamina usage when blocking attacks by 60%. Additionally increases defense and magic defense by 10.

skills.name: Divine
skills.description: Places a holy well below the caster, damaging nearby targets by $DMG over time. Generates high threat.

ranks.description: Places a holy well below the caster, damaging nearby targets by $DMG over time. Generates high threat.
